description: This file declares function prototypes for managing and retrieving video service parameters and downstream mappings in a C-based project related to RDK management. It primarily contains function declarations with no implementations, suited for interfacing with the underlying video service component.

methods.name: VideoService_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for the video service given its name, used for getting current configuration settings.

methods.name: VideoService_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for the video service based on the provided parameter name and value, used for configuring settings.

methods.name: WMMdownstreamMap_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter related to WMM downstream map settings.

methods.name: WMMdownstreamMap_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter related to WMM downstream map settings.
